name: Ice Cap
description:
Every time those ships come near that iceberg it melts a little more, and every year more and more ships keep coming.  You are but a wave in the sea, and you can't do much to change their course.  But if you get moving fast enough (arrow keys) you can become a very big wave, and you just might scare them away.

This is my first game, made in a few days for Climate Jam 2020. Thanks a lot for checking it out, I'd love to hear what you think! Hopefully I'll make another soon.

All art and programming and music by Peter Nichols, except the sky I got from the asset store, and the sound effects from freesound.org <3
